item.title: A Trick For Hiding Your Mail Address
item.dc:creator: Chris “Kwpolska” Warrick
item.description:
Re­cent­ly, Aza Raskin pub­lished a blog post about pro­tect­ing your mail ad­dress with CSS. He us­es some ran­dom CSS to make “ran­dom­ness” look like “racm­n­FudZG9otb­m­mVnzcewsos” when you copy it. That’s nice, but I found a bet­ter way — the Kw’s Mail Hide Trick. See it for your­self, af­ter the break.
